title: The Dig
notes: Game only launches in Windowed mode. Using Alt + Enter for fullscreen mode works, but leaves remnant image of whatever was on screen when fullscreen mode was entered on borders of screen.

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) HD Graphics 520 (Skylake GT2) x86/MMX/SSE2
notes:
Game and cutscenes all work nicely!
Hint with Alt+Enter for fullscreen is great! If you do that right before or after the "The DIG" title shows during the intro (ca. 1 minute in) when the screen is black, no remnants will show on the side.
You can then also safely Alt+Tab out and back in.
Bring up the settings dialog (with Save & Load as well) with Ctrl+F1.
(In case you can not type anything in the save dialog, you unfortunately need to Alt+Enter out of fullscreen again.)
title: The Dig®

cpu: AMD A4-6210 APU with AMD Radeon R3 Graphics
notes: runs perfectly windowed and fullscreen. use Alt+Enter to switch.
title: The Dig®
